function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overlap between public health champions and construction trades may limit the effectiveness of housing modification for malaria control.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of housing modification in controlling malaria transmission.","Mitigation":"Facilitate collaboration and communication between public health champions and built environment professionals.","Technologies":"Communication tools, collaborative platforms, project management software.","People":"Public health champions, construction trades, built environment professionals.","Owner":"Public health organizations, construction companies, research institutions."},{"Description":"Limited engagement and education within intervention strategies for malaria control.","Impact":"Reduced understanding and implementation of effective intervention strategies for malaria control.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement targeted education and engagement programs for intervention strategies.","Technologies":"Online courses, webinars, educational resources, virtual workshops.","People":"Public health professionals, community leaders, education institutions.","Owner":"Public health organizations, education institutions, NGOs."},{"Description":"Failure to develop concerted efforts for the future in addressing malaria transmission.","Impact":"Lack of coordinated and strategic approach to malaria control, leading to continued transmission.","Mitigation":"Create a framework for collaborative efforts and establish clear recommendations for future action.","Technologies":"Project management tools, collaborative platforms, data analysis software.","People":"Policy makers, public health organizations, research institutions.","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, international organizations."}]}
